title: Where do we live on earth? - Quora

response.answer_text: vague question, but along the outermost (lateral) crust from the core of this sphere shaped planet. don’t worry though, even though the planet spins at a million miles an hour, it doesn’t feel that way because the surroundings are moving in similar speeds and direction. so you won’t be flung from the surface due to stronger gravitational forces that gather towards the core of the planet, cool huh?

We live on the earth's surface, mainly on lands, in buildings.But if we do good service to the mankind as a leader or scientist or a philosopher, if well utilized & appreciated by most of the population for its usefulness and benefits, we will live for ever on the heart of people, even generations after generations.
